welcome_message: Submit your credentials to access the console
failure_message: Due to a technical problem, the console is currenlty not accessible, please hold on or try it later.
signup_wmessage: Please complete the following form to signup
signup_verif_rpassword: This is not yet identical to your password
signup_desc_invite: A coupon code can be added if you have one
signup_verif_conditions: You need to accept condition to register
sret_error_invalid_email: The given email is not accepted
sret_error_tenant_size: Please use a longer tenant name
sret_error_invalid: The given information are invalid, registration failed
sret_error_timeout: Your registration token has expired please retry
sret_error_internal: Internal failure, please try register later
sret_error_max_tenant: Impossible to create new tenant, maximum reached
signup_pmessage_1: Your registration has been taken into account, an email has been sent to your inbox.
signup_pmessage_2: Please confirm your email following the link sent to you.
signup_pmessage_3: If you do not find the email, please check your spam folder.
signup_vmessage_badkey: The validation key is not valid.
signup_vmessage_nokey: The validation require a validation key to be provided
signup_vmessage_success: Your account has been created. Now, you can connect
passlost_wmessage: To recover your password, please enter your email address
passlost_pmessage_1: Your password reset request has been taken into account, an email has been sent to your inbox.
passlost_pmessage_2: Please follow the link sent to you.
passlost_pmessage_3: If you do not find the email, please check your spam folder.
passlost_vmessage_badkey: The validation key is not valid.
passlost_vmessage_nokey: The validation require a validation key to be provided
passlost_vmessage_success: Your password has been updated. Now, you can connect
passlost_emessage: Your are now able to enter your new password
page_not_found: You get lost into the P2P network ... not found
page_error: Hummm ... sounds like we get stuck, too bad !
page_home: Let's try a safe place, nothing better than home
tip_dcBalanceStop: Under this amount the account will be deactivated
tip_dcPer24BMessage: Cost in DCs of an uplink message under 24 bytes
tip_dcPer24BDownlink: Cost in DCs of a dowlink message under 24 bytes
tip_dcPerJoinRequest: Cost in DCs of a Join Request frame
tip_maxJoinRequestDup: Max number of Join Req dup packet to invoice for a single JoinReq, -1 all
tip_dcPerJoinAccept: Cost in DCs of a Join Accept response
tip_dcPer24BDuplicate: Cost in DCs of duplicates (hotspots other than 1st one)
tip_dcPerDeviceInserted: Cost isn DCs for adding a new device
tip_inactivityBillingPeriodMs: Duration of an inactivity period in ms
tip_dcPerInactivityPeriod: Cost in DCs for a device w/o communication during a full inactivity period
tip_activityBillingPeriodMs: Duration of an activity period in ms
tip_dcPerActivityPeriod: Cost in DCs for a device with communiation for each activity period
tip_maxDcPerDevice: Quantity of DCs a device in the tenant is allowed to consume before being deactivated
tip_limitDcRatePeriodMs: Duration of device DC rate limitation in ms
tip_limitDcRatePerDevice: Maximum quantity of DCs a device is authorized to consume during this period
tip_dcMin: Minium quantity of DCs a user can purchase on the platform
tip_maxOwnedTenants: Maximum number of tenant a user can be owner
tip_maxDevices: Maximum devices a tenant can have, 0 unlimited
tip_signupAllowed: User are allowed to signup publicly when set to true
tip_freeTenantDc: Quantity of DCs offered on tenant creation
addtenantt_vmessage_success: Add a new template with success
tip_search_tenant: Enter at least 3 char to start searching for tenants, search owner email, tenant name and ids
error_load_basicstat: Impossible to load the tenant statistics, try later
error_find_basicstat: A tenant need to be seleted first. Go back on Chirpstack page
tip_mes_index: Id of the message for ordering them
tip_mes_type: Message can be a modal (full screen) or toaster
tip_mes_content: Message to be displayed to user
tip_mes_until: Time limit to display a message, 0 for unlimited
tip_mes_onlyone: When true, a time limited message will be displayed a single time or until the end date
tmes_unlimited: Check this for unlimited one time display
tip_username: User name, usually email, can't be changed
profile_uncomplete: Your user profile needs to be completed to purchase DCs, please fill at least the mandatory fields to reach the purchase pannel.
dc_trans_select_source: Select the source tenant where you want to take the Data Credits:
dc_trans_select_dest: Data Credits can be transered to any other Tenant you have access to. This operation is one way, make sure you select the right target.
dc_purch_title: How many Data Credits do you wish to purchase?
dc_purch_select_tenant: Select the Tenant you want to credit
error_load_tenants_setup: Failed to load the tenant parameters
error_load_transac_config: Failed to load the transaction configuration
dc_purch_nontransfer: Data Credit purchased on Console can only by used for device comunications and are non refoundable and non transferrable outside the Console.
dc_trans_memo_desc: Add an information you want to see on receipt, invoice
sret_stripe_unknown: Unknown backend error during stripe transaction creation
sret_stripe_failed_intent: Failed to create stripe transaction, try later
sret_stripe_amount_too_low: Currency amount is under the stripe limit
sret_stripe_invalid_email_admin: Admin user is not authorized to pay with stripe
sret_stripe_incomplete_profile: User profile must be completed before purchasing
dc_stripe_success: Stripe payment has been a success
inv_companyName_det: Company name to be printed on invoice
inv_companyAddress_det: Company address to be printed on invoice, mulitple lines
ticket_new_topic: What is your service request about?
ticket_new_details: Please give details about your service request
mig_title: Migrate devices from Helium legacy console
mig_setup_apiexplained_1: You need to create an API key from the legacy helium console to authorized our service to access your data and migrate your devices. The API key is not stored in our backend services during the operations.
mig_setup_apiexplained_2: To create the API key, go to your previous helium console / profile and create an API key
mig_setup_apiexplained_3: Once created, your API key needs to be validated, check your mailbox.
mig_setup_tenant_select: Select the tenant where you want to deploy your device fleet. The system is going to verify that the pre-requisite are in place to migrate your devices.
mig_setup_tenant_api: By selecting a tenant, an API key is going to be created into your chirpstack account, it is name MigrationKey and it can be deleted after the migration.
mig_err_api_key_delete: Internal error, impossible to delete previous Api Key
mig_err_api_key_create: Internal error, impossible to create the Api Key
mig_err_empty_tenants: No tenant found, you need to create one
mig_err_invalid_bearer: Invalid chripstack authentication, try to logout / login
mig_err_undefined: Error during Api Key creation, try later
mig_setup_devprofexplained_1: Joined devices live migration requires to have ABP device profile and OTAA device profile, per zone. It's possible within the same OUI only. Non live and between OUI migration only requires OTAA device profile per zone. According to your device fleet, please create the missing device profiles.
error_load_oui: Impossible to load OUI, try later
mig_setup_devprofexplained_2: When live migration is possible, create the missing ABP profiles
mig_setup_devprofexplained_3: Migration requires OTAA profiles as a target for the devices, please create the missing one.
mig_setup_label_select: Migration is possible 1 label at a time. When a multiple labels are associated to a sigle device, these labels can't be migrated. Please select the label you want to migrate.
mig_setup_function_select: Select the decoder function to be applied:
mig_setup_function_rewrite: The following function will be applied in chirpstack, please review this function and adapt it, the automatic migration is not able to manage all the migration situation.
mig_setup_appexplained_1: You can see the list of applications existing in your tenant, application is a group of devices with the same integration target. You can create a dedicated application. Select the default application you want to use for your devices. If the application already own a different integration, you can't select it
mig_new_app_setname: Please type a name for your application:
mig_device_explain_1: The last migration step consist in selecting the devices to be migrated and to verify the proposed settings. We recommand to migrate a single device on the first time to make sure the migration has been a success and to setup the integration function we can't migrate automatically. The Chirpstack payload is different from the Helium payload and you must adapt your backend.
mig_modal_description: The migration process will disable the device on the source. Make your selection and settings are correct. This can't be reverted
mig_setup_integration_info: Currenlty not all the type of integration are supported for migration, the list only displays what is supported.
bcopy_desc: Max quantity of packet purchased for each messages
bcopy_error: Error during max copy update, please try later
mig_setup_auth_data_tx: By entering your API key, you accept to transfer device meta-data, credentials and other needed information to this service.
uc_version_desc: Free text field for naming the current user condition version
uc_error_load_condition: Failed to load user condition version
uc_condition_message: The end user licence agreement has been updated, before being able to access the service, you need to renew your agreement for these new conditions.
uc_condition_visit: Please read the end-user license agreement
uc_condition_valid: I accept the new end-user license agreement
tip_search_user: Enter at least 3 chars to start searching for user email or ***
error_load_stat_nodata: No data found for that tenant
cc_tenant_template_desc: Select the tenant template to be activated by coupon
cc_tenant_prefix_desc: This header will be added to coupon name
cc_tenant_maxUse_desc: Max time the coupon can be used to create tenants
cc_tenant_couponFor_desc: Login of the user who get the coupon (free text fields)
cc_tenant_validity_desc: Duration in days of the coupon validity
cc_tenant_toCreate_desc: Number of different coupons to be created
cc_create_error: Error during coupon creation, please check inputs
